immediate_actions: Allocate capital towards genomic research initiatives.
Form strategic partnerships with biotech firms specializing in genetic therapies.
supervisor.executive_summary: To remain competitive and capture the growing personalized medicine market, immediate investment into genomic research is essential. Forming alliances with leading biotech companies will expedite our entry into this high-demand sector while managing risks effectively.

similar_products.therapy_area: Antibiotics - Macrolide Antibiotics for respiratory infections and other bacterial diseases.
Antibiotics - Macrolide Antibiotics for respiratory infections and other bacterial diseases.

usp_analysis.why_sales_are_strong: High market share due to fast action and fewer side effects.

new_product_launch_strategy.pricing_strategy: Value-based pricing considering the unique selling points and competitive landscape.
new_product_launch_strategy.positioning_strategy: Highlight azithromycin's fast action as a key differentiator in marketing materials.
new_product_launch_strategy.target_segment: Adult patients with bacterial respiratory tract infections seeking quick relief without severe side effects.
new_product_launch_strategy.partnership_recommendation: Collaborate with primary care clinics to ensure early prescriptions and enhance market penetration.

defensive_moves: Increase educational outreach on proper antibiotic use.
Expand into new therapeutic indications where azithromycin shows efficacy.
existing_product_market_strategy.pricing_adjustment: Maintain current pricing to leverage brand loyalty while monitoring competitor movements closely.
existing_product_market_strategy.marketing_focus: Emphasize the safety profile and fast action in marketing campaigns, targeting both new patients and existing users.
